com.sleepycat.bind
Interface EntryBinding

All Known Implementing Classes:
BooleanBinding, ByteArrayBinding, ByteBinding, CharacterBinding, DoubleBinding, FloatBinding, IntegerBinding, LongBinding, RecordNumberBinding, SerialBinding, ShortBinding, SortedDoubleBinding, SortedFloatBinding, StringBinding, TupleBinding, TupleInputBinding, TupleMarshalledBinding
public interface EntryBinding

A binding between a key or data entry and a key or data object.

Method Summary

          Converts a entry buffer into an Object.
